channel.title: Metro: Last Light
channel.description:
Metro: Last Light is the sequel to Metro: 2033. It seems like there were a lot of mixed opinions about Metro: 2033, so what are your feelings on the fact they are making a sequel?
Exclusive Metro Last Light Playthrough [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iCVREJyyZWA[/url]
E3 Gameplay Demo - Part 1 [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SKsB4hECFMQ[/url]
E3 Gameplay Demo - Part 2 [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xGFMJz5Moj0[/url]

item.description:
So much whining about the Gatling gun. It looks like it will be one of those weapons that you only find once or twice with just enough ammo to get you out of a tight spot, making it useless and pointless for you to drag around with you. Stop whining about it. The demo was made on a pre-alpha build of the game, so consider everything in that video subject to change.

gibbelin:

2033 was a fantastic game in every way, except the stealth and shooting. Which were kinda big screw ups. If they can fix those, the sequel should be great.

So everything was good except the gameplay. Would make a great movie then.
